subject: English Language
Boxing
lead_paragraph: In the buildup to Saturday’s fight against Zab Judah, Miguel Cotto, a world champion welterweight boxer, has mostly spoken in English, a step to achieving the global stardom he desires.
snippet: In the buildup to Saturday’s fight against Zab Judah, Miguel Cotto, a world champion welterweight boxer, has mostly spoken in English, a step to achieving the global stardom he desires.
